No Spectrum support detected Please contact your kernel dev and ask them to add Spectrum support No root detected Root access was not found or denied. Spectrum needs root to set profiles. Storage permission denied, Couldn\'t look for custom descriptions
The default Electron kernel profile, known for its smooth performance in basic tasks while maintaining fantastic battery. Tuned for top tier performance in standard tasks with many less regressions than Balanced, but maintains battery by limiting graphics. Ultra-conservative profile that lets performance take a hit in order to achieve long-lasting battery life. Need that extra 10 FPS? I gotchu. Identical to performance in most areas other than the unlocked Graphics performance
Woah there! Looks like you\'ve found the hidden EXKM Profile loader! While profile loading was originally planned to be a premium feature, I\'ve decided to include it as an easter egg. Others may be hidden in Spectrum, so happy hunting! Cancel OK Are you sure you want to load this file? Select a File Apply profile on boot Profile loader
